exhibitions.title: Packaging the New: Design and the American Consumer, l925-l975

title: Knife, "Silhouette", ca. 1930
description: Blade separately fabricated and attached with flanged shoulder and rounded end. Handle elongated oval shape with molded pattern of four overlapping panels interlocked at handle end and with plain reverse in center.
creditline: Museum purchase from Decorative Arts Association Acquisition Fund
markings: On blade, stamped: "INSICO/ STAINLESS." On handle, stamped: "1847 ROGERS BROS."
